item.title: How to Build a Podcast Player With React Js, Tailwind Css and Apple Podcast API
item.description: This article will cover all the steps and code needed to build a podcast player with React, TailwindCSS, and Apples' podcast API. It is a long one broken into five parts. I hope you are ready to dive in. Introduction React is a user interface framework developed by Facebook. It allows developers to build intuitive websites with rich user interactivity using HTML-like syntax. It also allows modularity, which means we can break code down into manageable modules that makes maintenance of your website easy.

item.title: How to use React useEffect to post data and refresh without infinite callback
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will walk you through updating your page DOM after an API call, using react hooks. In our example, we would be adding to a list of posts. After a new item is added to the list, we want to trigger react hooks to re-run our fetch API to update the list the user can see. The default behaviour of react useEffect() can lead to an infinite loop, although it is a working solution.

item.title: How to create Hugo blog on Github Pages Using Windows
